title: "Machine learning tool could provide unexpected scientific insights into COVID-19"
excerpt: "A team of materials scientists at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory -- scientists who normally spend their time researching things like high-performance materials for thermoelectrics or battery cathodes -- have built a text-mining tool in record time to help the global scientific community synthesize the mountain of scientific literature on COVID-19 being generated every day."
